ModMetaData.name: [DarkIntentions] Woohooer
ModMetaData.author: AliceTries
ModMetaData.description:
Release A3
Adds Sims (tm) like commands for woohooing with Pawns, including try for baby.
How this works: Adds a new ThoughDef (does not effect JobDef_Loving) and JobGiver (for ui click, requires basic (like flick)) Pregnancy is already a HeDiff defined for humanlikes; we human likes have a gestation period and the likes as do animals, in humanlikes case the default is 45. This is enabled "Woohoo with {Other}" (1% chance (Disabled)) and "Try for Baby {Other}" which has a 50% (Currently always) chance, which can be reduced by Fertility if defined as a capacity.
Birds and Bees Support by Fluffy If Fertility or Reproduction is a defined capacity then it is the average of the two partners then multiplies it times the base chance. To have a baby, each person must be fertile and their must be at least one person with a womb.

I should add a moodlet on the owners if in line of sight Minor: No Med Beds Allow Male Pregnancy with installed womb (Cost 3 Medicine, Skill level 8) Allow prisoners to be impregnated, current default is that they are not a prisoner on spawn but a "free" pawn of the mothers faction. Will need to create a Harmony Patch in A4
A2 : Major: Integrate with Children and Families, may be loaded above or below; I prefer above to ensure any nonsense in the other mod always overrules Minor: Check if already pregnant in this rather than in letting the game codes mate do it after we try to make a baby. this allows ui button to not show up if not pregnant.
